column2: "Na afei gyedzi nye adze a hɛn enyi da do ho awerɛhyɛmu a osi pi
column3: adze a enyi nntua ho no nokwar dasedzi."

column2: "Na no mu na tsetsefo no nyaa dase a wɔgyee no hɔn ho."
"Gyedzi na yɛdze tse ase dɛ wiadze horow a wɔdze Nyankopɔn n’asɛm siesiei
column3: na dza enyi tua ho yi mmfi dza ɔda hɔ mu na wɔyɛe."

column2: "Gyedzi na Abel dze bɔɔ afɔr a oye kyɛn Kain dze maa Nyankopɔn na ɔnam do nyaa dase a wodzii no no ho dɛ ɔtsen
column3: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn gye n’ayɛyɛdze ho dase: na ɔnam do na owui mpo a

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na wɔfaa Enok kɔree na oennhu owu; na woennhu no osiandɛ Nyankopɔn bɛfaa no kɔree
column3: na ansaana wɔfaa no kɔree no
column4: onyaa dase dɛ ɔasɔ Nyankopɔn enyi."

column2: "Sɛ gyedzi nnyi mu a
column3: obi nnkotum asɔ Nyankopɔn enyi; na nyia ɔba Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no otwar dɛ ɔgye dzi dɛ ɔwɔ hɔ
column4: na ɔyɛ hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ n’ekyir kwan no katuafo."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na wɔbɔɔ Noa nkaa wɔ dza wonnyae nnhunii ho a
column3: nyamesuro tuu no do
column4: na osiesiee hɛn dze gyee ne fifo nkwa
column5: na ɔnam do buu wiadze atsɛn na ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔdzedzifo maa gyedzi ho tsenenee no."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na Abraham
column3: wɔfrɛɛ no a
column4: otsiei dɛ ɔbɔkɔ beebi a daakye obenya no dɛ egyapadze
column5: na osii mu a nna onnyim mbrɛ ɔrokɔ."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na ɔkɛyɛɛ hɔho wɔ anohoba asaase no do dɛ dza ɔnnyɛ nedze
column3: na ɔnye Isaak nye Jakob a wɔyɛ anohoba kor no ara adzedzifo no kɛtsenaa asese mu;"

column2: "na n’enyi tua kurow no a ɔwɔ fapem no a nyia ɔkyekyeree na nyia ɔyɛɛ nye Nyankopɔn no."
"Gyedzi so na Sara dze
column3: onyaa ahoɔdzen dze nyinseen ɔba wɔ aber a ɔatra ne nyin
column4: osiandɛ obuu nyia ɔbɔɔ no anohoba no nokwafo:"

column2: "ntsi na ɔbaako a ɔyɛ dɛ oewu mpo no
column3: ɔwoo hɔn a wɔdɔɔ so dɛ sor nworaba
column4: na wɔtse dɛ mpoano anhwea a wonntum nnkan."

column2: "Gyedzi mu na iyinom nyina wuwui
column3: hɔn nsa annka anohoba no naaso wohunii wɔ ekyirekyir
column4: na wɔyɛɛ no etuu paa mu kaa dɛ
column5: wɔyɛ ahɔho nye akwantufo wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔkasa dɛm no wɔda no edzi dɛ wɔrohwehwɛ hɔn kurow bi."
"Nna sɛ hɔn adwen wɔ dza wofii mu kɔree no do a
column3: nkyɛ wɔwɔ ho kwan dɛ wɔsan kɔ hɔ."

column2: "Mbom afei wɔrohwehwɛ dza oye kyɛn ɔno
column3: iyi nye sor dze no: dɛm ntsi hɔn ho nnyɛ Nyankopɔn enyito dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no hɔn Nyankopɔn
column4: osiandɛ oesiesie kurow bi ama hɔn."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na wɔsɔɔ Abraham no hwɛe no
column3: ɔdze Isaak kɔbɔɔ afɔr: na nyia ɔgyee anohoba no dze ne ba kor no kɛmae;"

column2: "ɔno na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Isaak mu na wɔbɛfrɛ w’asefo no."

column2: "Obuu dɛ Nyankopɔn botum enyan no efi ewufo mu mpo; hɔ so na onyaa no bio wɔ abɛbu mu."
"Gyedzi ntsi na Isaak hyiraa Jakob nye Esau wɔ ndzɛmba a ɔreba ho mpo."
"Gyedzi ntsi na Jakob ruwu a
column3: ohyiraa Josef ne mba beenu no
column4: na ɔkoom no poma tsir do sɔree."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na Josef n’ewiei rebɛn no
column3: ɔkaa nkɔree a Israelmba rubotu akɔ no ho asɛm: na ɔhyɛɛ ne mbiew ho samansew."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na wɔwoo Moses no n’awofo dze no sumaa abosoom ebiasa
column3: osiandɛ wohun dɛ ɔyɛ abofra a no ho yɛ fɛw: na woennsuro ɔhen ne mbra no."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na Moses nyinii a
column3: ɔpoow dɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Farao babaa ba;"

column2: "na ɔfaa dɛ ɔnye Nyankopɔn no nkorɔfo bohu amandze mbom kyɛn dɛ obedzi bɔn ho dɛw ber tsiabaa bi;"
"na obuu Kraest ahorbahyɛ no ahonya kɛse kyɛn Egypt ahonyadze
column3: na ɔhwɛɛ akatua no."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na ɔdaan Egypt gyae na oennsuro ɔhen no n’ebufuw no: na ɔsɔɔw no dɛ n’enyi tua nyia wonnhu no."
"Gyedzi ntsi na odzii apaho no
column3: nye bɔgyaa petse no
column4: ma mbakan sɛɛfo no eennkunkum hɔn no."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na wotwaa Mbɛw Po no dɛ wewew do; ɔno na Egyptfo reyɛ bi ahwɛ a
column3: po no meen hɔn no."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na Jeriko afasu no wɔbɔɔ ho aprɔw nda esuon a
column3: obui."

column2: "Gyedzi ntsi na edwaman Rahab gyee akwanserafo no asomdwee mu
column3: ma ntsi ɔammfora asokyewfo no annhera."

column2: "Na menka dɛn bio? Sɛ mereka Gideon
column3: Barak
column5: David nye Samuel nye nkɔnhyɛfo no ho asɛm a

column2: "Hɔn na wɔnam gyedzi do dzii ahendzi horow do konyim
column3: yɛɛ ndzeyɛtsenenee

column2: "duum gya ahoɔdzen
column3: guaan nkrantsee ano

column2: "Mbaa nsa kaa hɔn efun a wɔsoɛree
column3: na binom so wɔhyɛɛ hɔn amen
column5: ama woeenya owusoɛr a oye kyɛn."

column2: "Na binom so nyaa atwetwesi nye ɔhwe
column3: nye mpokyerɛ nye efiadzenda so."

column2: "Wosiiw hɔn abo
column3: wɔdze seradaa paapaa hɔn
column5: wɔdze nkrantsee kum hɔn; wokyinii wɔ nguan nwoma nye mpɔnkye nwoma mu

column2: "hɔn na wiadze mmfata hɔn: wokyinkyiin sar nye mbepɔw do
column3: abodan nye asaase etu mu."

column2: "Na iyinom nyina a wɔnam gyedzi do nyaa dase no
column3: hɔn nsa annka anohoba no
column5: "osiandɛ Nyankopɔn esiesie biribi a oye kyɛn dɛm esie hɛn dɛ wokwetsi hɛn a worinndzi mu."
